review: I have this device for almost a year now.  At first I thought this little gadget was over priced but now believe it is worth every penny I paid for. The video and sound quality from YouTube streaming on this Apple TV device  is unbelievable and better than what you get from the Hi-Def channels on dish network.  Netflix video/audio streaming quality is excellent.  Now you know why Apple products are priced higher than competitor's and why their stock price is > $550/share.You can also remotely connect your iPad thru Air Play to Apple TV and view your iPad screen/pictures, etc on the TV screen with no loss of sound or picture quality. Way to go Apple.  Steve Jobs was a genius who clearly differentiated Apple products from the rest of the competetion.The smart TV interface for Youtube and other internet browsing is garbage and hard to navigate.The remote is sleek and very user friendly and has a robust builtin WiFi. No cons except a bit expensive but definitely worth the price.  I will recommend this to anyone who wants to watch quality YouTube, Netflix  streaming and iPad mirroring on the TV.
author: Barney

review: Out of the box, the remote did NOT work. After phone calls to Apple tech support and a visit to Apple store, Apple replaced the remote. So far, Apple TV is working well.
